open_prs.title: Upgrade from Cropper.js v1 to Cropper.js v2
build: Clean up and reorganize `backend` container build
Consider running Playwright as Docker container
ci: Build issues in Gulp do not cause builds to fail
Move moderator role to Keycloak
Allow application developers to manage their own Clients
Support passkeys
Support social login providers
Incorrect canonical redirect?
Use tagify SCSS file for styling of tag inputs
🌅 GS1 "Sunrise 2027" - 2D Barcodes, GS1 Element String, and GS1 Digital Link URI support
Empty search produces weird download
Singular facet URL provides empty page
Folksonomy Engine loads CSS and a font from CDNs
Incorrect casing for kilojoule in nutrition facts
Reduce or remove generated JavaScript
Remove app specific stuff from the config
Get new insights after toggling selection
" escaped double quotes in JSON/CSV
Expiration date format
Made Near Me creates a huge single HTML file
change unit_to_g() to unit_to_default_unit() ?
Review internal code range
Refactor taxonomy unit tests
Consider creating an API for moving products with history
Implement a central User Service for auth - keycloak
Better handle localized values nested in code
Repair the GraphViz feature
Review the use of the graph drawing library SigmaJS
Consider splitting data directories
